author: HarleyMeenen
title: Disappointing
review:
I was so excited to get the skateboarding sets, but unfortunately have to acknowledge that they just don't live up to expectations. This set falls prey to the same problems as others in the Gravity Games line: an easy build that fails to deliver after completion. 

The build is simple and unexciting. The set looks good enough when completed, but the functionality isn't there. The figures don't go down the ramp on their own without falling over and the trick handle is unwieldy. I did have a little success using the skateboards like a Tech Deck. Overall, though, a set that should be highly playable is borderline unworkable.

In the end, I can't recommend this set for anyone but skating enthusiasts who want a ramp to display and never use.
